threads.title: update 7/11/22
threads.latestCommentText: heyo! i didn't abandon anyland just yet- it's just that one of my controllers died on me so i haven't done any vr in a few months. i'll be back with more cool stuff soon!

stickies.title: all about me...
stickies.latestCommentText: you can also sometimes catch me on neos or vrchat, but i tend to only do private sessions with my real-life friends on those. my username is the same as here or legenddari.
